poolName.description: Lowercase name of pool / pool token e.g. 'bct'

poolAddress.description: Address of the pool itself, e.g. bct token address

projectTokenAddress.description: Address of the project token in this pool

isPoolDefault.description: True if default project for pool and no selective redemption fee applies

singleUnitPrice.description: formatted USDC price for 1 tonne e.g. '0.123456'
